solution_line_template: There are {initial_apples}-{ricki_removes} = <<{initial_apples}-{ricki_removes}={after_ricki}>>{after_ricki} apples left after Ricki removes some.
There are {after_ricki}-{samson_removes} = <<{after_ricki}-{samson_removes}={after_samson}>>{after_samson} apples left after Samson removes some.
